snippet.title: Sneakers (2001 Xbox Game Studios) Trailer [FHD]
snippet.description:
Sneakers, released in Japan as Nezmix: Have A Mice Day! (ねずみくす), is a video game published by Microsoft Game Studios exclusively for the Xbox in 2002. Sneakers is an action-puzzle game in which the player leads a group of mice to explore a house and its surroundings to detect enemy rats and protect their group in beat 'em up fights.

Source: GameWave DVD Vol. 14
The video has been upscaled to Full HD resolution with a sharpen effect.

▶ Please like this video and subscribe to my channel for more great retro content.

▶ Write a comment. Your feedback is very important to me.
